Are you sure you want to delete the file: Are you sure you want to delete this file/folder?
CNAME Tips: To set up a custom domain, please add a `CNAME` record for your domain pointing to {{domain}} at your domain registrar. You can bind your custom domain once the DNS resolution takes effect.
CPU target is the CPU utilization rate o: Target CPU is the utilization of any single container
Can help you deploy any Docker image: Rich image warehouse, supporting any Docker image
Can not change storage path: Storage mount path cannot be modified
Click on any shadow to skip: Click on any shadow to skip
Cname auth error: customDomain's cname i: CNAME error. You must configure CNAME to the provided domain before binding.
Configurable number of instances or auto: Configurable replica count and auto horizontal scaling
Confirm Deploy Application?: Are you sure you want to deploy the application?

Confirm to restart this application?: Are you sure you want to update the application?
Custom Domain Error: Failed to add custom domain. Please verify CNAME configuration.
Data cannot be communicated between mult: Data cannot be shared between instances

one per line, key and value separated by colon or equals sign, e.g.:
mongoUrl=127.0.0.1:8000
redisUrl:127.0.0.0:8001
-env1 =test

If no, the default command is used: Leave blank to use the default command
Name: Name

Starts with a letter and can contain onl: Must start with a letter, followed by lowercase letters, digits, or hyphens (-)
The application name can contain only lo: Application name can only contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-), and must start with a letter
The cpu target value must be positive: Target CPU must be a positive number
The target cpu value must be less than 1: Target CPU must be less than 100
You haven't created any application yet: You don't have any applications yet

app_already_exists: App name already exists. Please use a different name or check your app list.
delete_app_tip: Are you sure you want to delete this application? All project data will be permanently lost if you proceed.
delete_sealaf_app_tip:
The application is deployed via cloud development. 
Simply deleting the app won't clear out all of the app's components, which may still accrue charges. 
To completely uninstall the app and clean all related components, uninstall the entire app in cloud development.
delete_template_app_tip: This app is managed by the app store. You are now going to the app store to delete all app components.
domain_not_bound_modal_description: Are you sure you want to close the pop-up?
domain_not_bound_modal_warning: DNS records are not active yet, so your domain isn't bound. Closing the pop-up requires re-entering the domain.
domain_requires_registration_tip_1: Please purchase a domain and complete ICP filing through
domain_requires_registration_tip_2: , then fill it in the input field below.
domain_input_tip: Please purchase a domain name and fill it below.
domain_verification_dns_records_tip_1: Please add a CNAME record for your domain pointing to
domain_verification_dns_records_tip_2: with your DNS provider. Once the DNS update takes effect, you can bind your custom domain.
domain_verification_success: Your domain has been successfully bound.

driver.click_anywhere: Click anywhere to finish the tutorial.
driver.copy_address: Copy the private or public address for access
driver.create_launchpad_header: Feel free to explore. No changes will be saved and no charges will apply in this guided demo.
driver.define_image_settings: Define image settings, and adjust CPU & memory as needed
driver.define_settings: Define your application settings and start deployment
driver.find_guide_tip: You can always find your way back to this guide in the top navigation bar. Happy exploring!

first_charge_tip: For some specifications, you can enjoy double the gift amount when you recharge for the first time.
forbidden_create_app: You do not have sufficient permissions to create an application in the current workspace. Please contact the owner of the workspace to request the necessary permissions.
guide_deploy_storage: Massive storage to meet various application needs
guide_detail_network: Provide intranet and extranet access addresses and automatically configure SSL certificates
guide_detail_update_button: Adjust in real time as needed
jump_message: This app can't be used standalone. Click OK to open it via Sealos Desktop.
network_not_ready: The internal gateway requires 2 to 5 minutes to prepare. Please be patient.
pause_message: Pausing the service will stop the calculation of charges for CPU and memory, but charges for storage and external network ports will still apply. Would you like to pause now?
set_remarks_placeholder: Set remarks to help identify this app or service more easily.
total_price_tip: The estimated cost does not include port fees and traffic fees, and is subject to actual usage.
update_sealaf_app_tip: This application is deployed through cloud development. To change the application, please go to cloud development.
user_balance_not_enough: Almost there! You need additional credits for this deployment.
